# JavaScript/TypeScript SDK Requirements

## Required Checks

| Requirement | Check Command | Min Version | Purpose | Auto Install | Installation Instructions |
|-------------|---------------|-------------|---------|--------------|--------------------------|
| pnpm | `pnpm --version` | - | Package manager | true | `npm install -g pnpm`<br>Then: Navigate to the root of the JavaScript SDK repository and run `pnpm install` |
